DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of KPS-0373 in patients with SCD.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of KPS-0373 in Patients With Spinocerebellar Degeneration (SCD)
DOC.criteria: Japanese SCD patients with mild to moderate ataxia Patients with secondary ataxia Patients with clinically significant hepatic, renal, or cardiovascular dysfunction
